attributes.title: This app turned my life for the worst
attributes.review: This app threw a rat at me, both metaphorically and literally, and now I can’t get the rat out of my house, it’s too orange and stinky...help

attributes.title: Wow
attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrible. Not only did it freeze my phone as soon as I started using it, but my phone keeps shutting off now. Are these apps adding viruses to our phones ? Took me 10 minutes to uninstall it because of how bad it kept freezing! Do not download ! Still trump 2020

attributes.title: HORRIFIC APP DONT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see some good old white supremacist content. I did not expect an app of such terrible quality coming from our one and only Cheeto king 😔. I’m absolutely heartbroken. I may just have to settle for Biden....
This app is horrible, it doesn’t even deserve to be called an app. Low quality, delete this immediately. Complete and utter waste of my time.

attributes.title: Trump = 🤢 ; Trump App = 🤮
attributes.review: Don’t even waste your time with this app. Upon downloading you will notice over time how your phone begins to glitch and crash. And everyday your phone and apps will seemingly begin to run slower and slower. Also yeah trump you’re cancelled gen z did something right. We getting your app deleted ASAP. Shouldn’t have messed with us 😜

attributes.title: TRASH 🤮
attributes.review: If I could rate it negative stars, I would.
ThisStuff is trash nobody likes it delete the app

attributes.title: Stealing personal information!
attributes.review: I’am seriously furious about this app! I will be looking into legal action to see what can be done! This app is designed to steal data and personal information from devices from people! If I could give this app negative 100 stars I would! This kind of behavior has to stop, if this isn’t ok for the average person then there should be no way it should be ok for the President of our country! He should hold himself to a higher standard! What a joke! 🙄🤦🏽‍♀️👩🏽‍💻🤡🎃

attributes.title: So disappointed but I love Trump
attributes.review: I actually LOVE Trump! I voted for him every year! I was excited about the app but as soon as I downloaded it, it asked for my email and phone number. No biggie right, so of course I entered my info and almost immediately I started getting BOMBARDED with text messages and emails from the app! Even though I never turned on notifications. At one point I even got a text telling me to go back to my country even though I was born here.

attributes.title: Trump is a joke
attributes.review: He is dangerous to this country and people are to ignorant to see that 99.9% of the stuff he has done has been bad or dumb and I’m so disappointed in how many people still say “trump 2020”. Pathetic.
